text: Before anything started.  I was told to report at 7am on level 10 to register.  I arrived 7.05, there was already 2 ahead of me with only 1 business consultant.  In the next 1/2 hour there were 7 more came waiting.  Raffles, you need to deploy more people to handle the admin stuff.  The first impression with your cancer centre is already poorly managed…

Arrived for my scheduled appointment at 10.30am, but was told there will be a change in Oncologist. Waited for 2 hours and only saw the oncologist at 12.30pm. Not sure why can’t the nurses inform me of the change through a text/ phone call so i won’t need to wait that long? Poor-ed.
If cancer patients need professional and responsible oncologists, please avoid this place .
